name: Stacktray
tagline: Manage your Stacks from the status bar (tray) (Amazon EC2)
body:
### StackTray
StackTray enables you to manage your cloudstacks from the OSX statusbar. Using StackTray you can connect to instances, reboot, start, stop, copy addresses to clipboard etc.

Currently only Amazon AWS is supported.

### Screenshots
[![Preferences](images/Screen Shot 2014-05-01 at 22.15.26.png)]
[![Statusbar menu](images/Screen Shot 2014-05-01 at 22.20.40.png)]
[![Instance menu](images/Screen Shot 2014-05-01 at 22.20.57.png)]

### Authors and Contributors

### Releases
https://github.com/dutchcoders/stacktray/releases
